summary.purpose: Defines all the individual form element building-block components used by ModularForm, plus shared layout helpers and constants.
summary.problem_solved: Provides a comprehensive set of reusable, consistently styled form element components (input, date input, select, multi-select, searchable select, textarea, checkbox, duration picker, separator) with shared label rendering, container layout, validation, sorting, and RTL/LTR direction support. Also provides an ElementsContainer component for grouping form elements with automatic label width equalization.

symbols.name: useSortValues
symbols.description: A memoized hook that sorts an options array (objects with label property) alphabetically via localeCompare or numerically via parseInt, then optionally reverses for descending ('cba') order. Filters out falsy values before sorting.

symbols.name: InputContainer
symbols.description: Renders a labeled HTML input element inside a FormElementContainer. Supports text validation via useValidation hook, custom onChange handler composed with handleChange utility, configurable input type, placeholder, minLength, value/defaultValue, and all common label/container styling props.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal row with a text label on the start side and a styled input field (with gray border that darkens on hover) on the end side, supporting various input types (text, number, etc.).

symbols.name: DateInputContainer
symbols.description: Renders a labeled date input inside a FormElementContainer using react-aria-components DatePicker. Features an accessible date text input with a calendar icon button that opens a popover calendar. Wraps in I18nProvider with en-GB locale. Supports controlled (value) and uncontrolled (defaultValue) modes with synthetic onChange events.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal row with a text label and a date input field that includes a calendar icon trigger button. Clicking the icon opens a popover calendar for date selection.

symbols.name: SelectContainer
symbols.description: Renders a labeled custom dropdown select inside a FormElementContainer. Manages open/close state internally, displays the selected option label, shows sorted options in a scrollable dropdown, and stores the selected value in a hidden input for form submission. Supports optional sorting via useSortValues.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal row with a text label and a clickable select box showing the current selection. When clicked, a dropdown list of options appears below with hover highlighting. Chevron icon indicates open/closed state.

symbols.name: MultiSelect
symbols.description: Renders a labeled multi-select element inside a FormElementContainer, delegating to the MultipleSelector UI component. Supports search (async and sync), groupBy, create-new-option, unremovable options, badge styling, and sorted options.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal row with a text label and a multi-select input that displays selected items as removable badges. Provides a searchable dropdown for selecting multiple options.

symbols.name: SelectWithSearch
symbols.description: Renders a labeled searchable single-select inside a FormElementContainer, delegating to the SearchSelect UI component. Supports sorted options, create-new-option, disabled state, and extensive className customization for the button, dropdown, search input, and not-found label.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal row with a text label and a select button that opens a searchable dropdown. Users can type to filter options and select a single value.

symbols.name: TextAreaContainer
symbols.description: Renders a labeled HTML textarea element inside a FormElementContainer. Supports controlled and uncontrolled value modes, direction-aware text alignment, placeholder, minLength, and configurable min/max height (min-h-16, max-h-52 with overflow-auto).

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal row with a text label and a resizable textarea with gray border styling, supporting scrollable overflow for long content.

symbols.name: FormSeparator
symbols.description: Renders a simple horizontal divider line (1px gray border-bottom) for visually separating form sections. Accepts optional children and additional div props.

details.rendered_ui_description: A thin horizontal gray line spanning the form width, optionally containing child content.

symbols.name: CheckboxContainer
symbols.description: Renders a labeled checkbox inside a FormElementContainer, wrapping the shared Checkbox utility component. Supports checked/setChecked controlled state, disabled, rotation, custom circle styling, and title tooltip.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal row with a text label and a toggle checkbox component with customizable appearance.

symbols.name: DurationPicker
symbols.description: Renders a labeled duration input with configurable time unit fields (days, hours, minutes, seconds). Each field is a clamped numeric input. Stores the total duration in seconds in a hidden input for form submission. Uses secondsToDuration/durationToSeconds helpers for conversion.

details.rendered_ui_description: A horizontal row with a text label and a set of small bordered numeric input boxes (one per selected time unit: D, H, M, S), each with an optional single-character label header. Always renders left-to-right regardless of form direction.

symbols.name: FormElementContainer
symbols.signature: (props: BaseElementProps & { children: ReactNode; defaultContainerClassName?: boolean }) => JSX.Element
symbols.description: A shared layout container for all form elements. Renders children alongside an optional ElementLabel in a flex row with the default container class (flex justify-start items-center gap-3 w-full). The defaultContainerClassName flag controls whether the default flex layout is applied.

details.rendered_ui_description: A flex row container that optionally renders a label on the start side followed by the form element children.

symbols.name: ElementLabel
symbols.description: Renders a styled form label with the 'form-label' CSS class for auto-width equalization. Optionally displays a red asterisk for required fields and a colon when withDots is true. Supports direction-aware styling and common label className injection.

details.rendered_ui_description: A text label with optional red asterisk (*) for required fields and optional colon (:) suffix, rendered with nowrap text and direction-aware alignment.

symbols.name: ElementsContainerProps
symbols.signature: interface ElementsContainerProps extends BaseElementProps { children: ReactNode; childrenContainerClassName?: string; className?: string; headlineClassName?: string; autoFixLabelsWidth?: boolean; autoFixLabelsWidthDeps?: any[]; headline?: ReactNode; }

symbols.name: ElementsContainer
symbols.description: A memoized (via React.memo with propsAreEqual) container for grouping multiple form elements. Automatically equalizes label widths across all child elements using useDeepCompareEffect. Injects shared elementClassName, labelClassName, and containerClassName into children via cloneElement. Supports an optional headline with styled border.

details.rendered_ui_description: A vertical container with an optional bold headline with gray bottom border at the top, followed by a column of form elements with equalized label widths and consistent spacing.
